unnormalised: Hey! Pesticide usage is a big topic, especially in Punjab's fields. My grandfather remembers times before so many chemicals. I read an article from IARI dated 26/01/2023 about organic farming. It's gotta be better than spraying everything, right? Maybe farmers can explore alternatives like neem-based solutions or crop rotation. Heard a seminar on this on 10/10/2024 at 14:00 hrs in Delhi. Saw some good practices.
normalised: Hey! Pesticide usage is a big topic, especially in Punjab's fields. My grandfather remembers times before so many chemicals. I read an article from I A R I dated twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three about organic farming. It's gotta be better than spraying everything, right? Maybe farmers can explore alternatives like neem-based solutions or crop rotation. Heard a seminar on this on tenth October two thousand and twenty four at two P M in Delhi. Saw some good practices.
